segments.text: I just received a phone call for an interview next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Congratulations ! This is your first interview ever .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: thank you , but I'm nervous . I don't know what to do.Could you tell me what should I do before an interview ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure , you should prepare so that you can give proper response when you're being interviewed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yeah , besides my personal introduction , what else should I prepare ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you should collect as much information about the company and the position you're applying for as you can . It is important to show that you've done some research into the company . The interviewers Wil
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: then what should I do when I'm being interviewed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: smile at the interviewers and look them in their eyes while trying to persuade them to select you . Try to act natural , let your personality , ability and interpersonal skills shine through the interview
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: are there any other things I should pay attention to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yeah , wear formal clothes to your interview and do be punctual . That'll leave your interviewers with a good first impression .
segments.speaker: S2
